actions.text: Amendment SA 676 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 177.

Amendment SA 676 proposed by Senator Durbin. (consideration: CR S6445-6448; text: CR S6445-6446) To provide alternate terms for the United States participation in the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 676 proposed by Senator Durbin.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 676 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 177.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 676 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 52. Record Vote Number: 177.

purpose: To provide alternate terms for the United States participation in the Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria.
